page.title: 07Rowlands Castle(West Sussex)
page.content: Lots of people have come from a long distance to see the castle but there is no castle.{The population is}about three and a half thousand ,most of which don't work here but go to work in{Portsmouth, Southampton}and even some in{London}. Lots of people work at{IBM}the computer people.Also some people are naval captains. Quite a lot of retired people come here for their last years. Rowlands Castle used to be a farming community but in the last{twenty {years}it has grown up with all the houses.Rowlands Castle used to be busy and lots of houses used to be shops.There are about{7 shops}in Rowlands Castle.The people of Rowlands Castle would not like neighbouring{ {Leigh Park estate}to overlap them.
